price: 46. al Faraón y a sus dignatarios, pero los rechazaron con soberbia y fueron un pueblo altivo.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَالِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi fa-is'takbarū wakānū qawman ʿālīna
